mapper.select: SELECT PK_SUBJECT_SEQ AS pkSubjectSeq, SUBJECT_NAME AS subjectName, SUBJECT_STATE AS subjectState, SUB_START_DT AS subStartDt, SUB_END_DT AS subEndDt, SUBJECT_TEATHER AS subjectTeather, SUBJECT_TEST AS subjectTest, SUBJECT_TEST_DT AS subjectTestDt, REGIST_ID AS registId, REGIST_DT AS registDt, UPDATE_ID AS updateId, UPDATE_DT AS updateDt FROM SUBJECT WHERE PK_SUBJECT_SEQ=#{pkSubjectSeq}
